meta.title: Pagination Nav
meta.description: Quick first, previous, next, last, and page buttons for navigation based pagination, supporting regular links or router links.

props.description: Alignment of the page buttons: 'start' (or 'left'), 'center', 'end' (or 'right'), or 'fill'
Value to place in the 'aria-label' attribute of the pagination control
Base URL to use when auto generating page links
Class(es) to apply to the 'ellipsis' placeholders
Content to place in the ellipsis placeholder
Class(es) to apply to the 'Go to first page' button
Display first page number instead of Goto First button
Content to place in the goto first page button
Do not show ellipsis buttons
Hides the goto first and goto last page buttons
Value to place in the 'aria-label' attribute of the goto first page button
Value to place in the 'aria-label' attribute of the goto last page button
Value to place in the 'aria-label' attribute of the goto next page button
Value to place in the 'aria-label' attribute of the goto page button. Page number will be prepended automatically
Value to place in the 'aria-label' attribute of the goto previous page button
Class(es) to apply to the 'Go to last page' button
Display last page number instead of Goto Last button
Content to place in the goto last page button
Maximum number of buttons to show (including ellipsis if shown, but excluding the bookend buttons)
Link generator function. See docs for details
Class(es) to apply to the 'Go to next page' button
Content to place in the goto next page button
Disable of auto detection of current page
Total number of pages
Class(es) to apply to the 'Go to page #' buttons
Page number generator function. See docs for details
Array of page numbers and links
Applies pill styling to the pagination buttons
Class(es) to apply to the 'Go to previous page' button
Content to place in the goto previous page button
Size of the rendered buttons: 'sm', 'md' (default), or 'lg'
Render router-links instead of links when auto generating the page links
Current page number, starting from 1

events.description: Emitted when page changes via user interaction
Emitted when page changes via user interaction or programmatically

args.description: Selected page number (starting with `1`), or `null` if no page found

events.description: Emitted when a page button was clicked. Cancelable

args.description: The `BvEvent` object. Call `bvEvent.preventDefault()` to cancel page selection

slots.name: first-text
slots.description: The "go to first page" button content. Optionally scoped

scope.description: Will be true if this button is disabled (non-clickable)

slots.name: last-text
slots.description: The "go to last page" button content. Optionally scoped

scope.description: Will be true if this button is disabled (non-clickable)

slots.name: next-text
slots.description: The "go to next page" button content. Optionally scoped

scope.description: Will be true if this button is disabled (non-clickable)

slots.name: page
slots.description: Page number button content. Always scoped

scope.description: If the page is the active page
Default button content, or the result of the page-gen function
Will be true if this button is disabled (non-clickable)

slots.name: prev-text
slots.description: The "go to previous page" button content. Optionally scoped

scope.description: Will be true if this button is disabled (non-clickable)
